description.@en: You have given yourself to the god’s mercy, taking no part in the selfish passions nor acts of violence. You are a pacifist at heart and it brings you great sorrow when you do hurt another – even if they would intend to kill you.

effect.@en: Should you intentionally bring harm upon a creature classified as a Humanoid (including player Ancestries), you are unable to call upon your White Witchery abilities for three days.
